trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> class represents a schema class definition that is contained in the schema partition.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> representa una definición de clase de esquema que se incluye en la partición del esquema.

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />
trans-unit.target: Valor de petición: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object that specifies the context for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> que especifica el contexto de este objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the LDAP display name for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa el nombre LDAP para mostrar de este objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A> method must be called to commit the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object that was created to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A> método debe llamarse para confirmar la <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> objeto que se creó para el almacén de directorios subyacente.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> does not refer to a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet" />, <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> no hace referencia a un objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet" /> válido, o <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> es una cadena vacía.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> or <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <paramref name="context" /> o <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains the auxiliary classes of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> que contiene las clases auxiliares del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objects that represent the auxiliary classes of the current schema class object.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> que contiene objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> que representan las clases auxiliares del objeto de clase de esquema actual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Common Name (CN) of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el nombre común (CN) del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the CN of the current class object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa el CN del objeto de clase actual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> descriptor of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el descriptor <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> predeterminado del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> object that represents the default security descriptor for the current schema class object.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity" /> que representa el descriptor de seguridad predeterminado del objeto de clase de esquema actual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece una descripción del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a description of the current class object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contiene una descripción del objeto de clase actual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos utilizados por el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos utilizados por el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the managed resources should be released; <see langword="false" /> if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si deben liberarse los recursos administrados; es <see langword="false" /> si solo deben liberarse los recursos no administrados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos administrados que el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> utiliza y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos no administrados.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object that specifies the context for the search.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> que especifica el contexto de la búsqueda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the LDAP display name of the schema class for the search.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que especifica el nombre LDAP para mostrar de la clase de esquema para la búsqueda.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object in the Active Directory Domain Services schema partition that matches a given directory context and name.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> en la partición del esquema de Active Directory Domain Services que coincide con un nombre y contexto de directorio determinados.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object for the schema class that was found.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> para la clase de esquema que se ha encontrado.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if the class was not found.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve <see langword="null" /> si no se encuentra la clase.

trans-unit.source: The object was not found.
trans-unit.target: No se encontró el objeto.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> does not refer to a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> or <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet" />, <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> no hace referencia a un objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" /> o <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet" /> válido, o <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> es una cadena vacía.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> or <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <paramref name="context" /> o <paramref name="ldapDisplayName" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> collection that contains all properties, including ancestor properties, of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una colección <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> que contiene todas las propiedades, incluso las antecesoras, del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> collection of the properties of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />, including ancestor properties.
trans-unit.target: Colección <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> de las propiedades de <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />, incluidas las antecesoras.

trans-unit.source: If the method is called on an unbound object instance, an empty <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection> collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: Si se llama al método en una instancia de objeto independiente, vacío <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection> se devuelve la colección.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> para el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object that represents the directory entry for the schema class.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> que representa la entrada del directorio para la clase de esquema.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object is not a valid instance.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> no es una instancia válida.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object is defunct.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> está inactivo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates if the current schema class object is defunct.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> que indica si el objeto de clase de esquema actual está inactivo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object is defunct; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el objeto está inactivo; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains the properties that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> must contain.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> que contiene las propiedades que <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> debe contener.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> objects that represent the properties that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object must contain.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> que contiene los objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> que representan las propiedades que el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> debe contener.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ldapDisplayName of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el ldapDisplayName del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the ldapDisplayName of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contiene el ldapDisplayName del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea el tema [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) en la biblioteca de MSDN en [ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the OID for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el OID del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the OID of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa el OID del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains the properties that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> can contain.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> que contiene las propiedades que <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> puede contener.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> objects that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object can contain.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection" /> que contiene los objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty" /> que el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> puede contener.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> que contiene los objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> que la clase <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> puede contener.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objects that this class can contain.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> que contiene los objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> que esta clase puede contener.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objects that can contain this class.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> que contiene los objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> que pueden contener esta clase.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> object that contains the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> objects that can contain this class.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection" /> que contiene los objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> que pueden contener esta clase.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes to the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object to the underlying directory store.
trans-unit.target: Confirma todos los cambios del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> actual en el almacén de directorios subyacente.

trans-unit.source: The context is an AD LDS configuration set and the AD LDS instance could not be found.
trans-unit.target: El contexto es un conjunto de configuración de AD LDS y no se ha podido encontrar la instancia de AD LDS.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the schemaIDGUID for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el schemaIDGuid para el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic "schemaIDGUID" or "Schema-ID-GUID" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea el tema "schemaIDGUID" o "Schema-ID-GUID" de MSDN Library en la dirección [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> object that contains the schemaIDGUID for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> que contiene el schemaIDGUID para el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topic "schemaIDGUID" or "Schema-ID-GUID" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, vea el tema "schemaIDGUID" o "Schema-ID-GUID" en MSDN Library en [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.SchemaGuid%2A> is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.SchemaGuid%2A> se utiliza en muchas operaciones de configuración de servicios de dominio de Active Directory, como la administración de derechos extendidos.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the schema class from which the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object is derived.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la clase de esquema de la que se deriva el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object that contains the schema class from which the current schema class is derived.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> que contiene la clase de esquema de la que se deriva la clase de esquema actual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> if no schema class was specified during the creation of the current class.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="null" /> si no se ha especificado ninguna clase de esquema durante la creación de la clase actual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.source: Gets the LDAP display name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el nombre LDAP para mostrar del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the LDAP display name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que representa el nombre LDAP para mostrar del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> type for the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el tipo <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> value that contains the type of the current <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Valor de <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> que contiene el tipo del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass" /> actual.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
trans-unit.target: El servidor de destino está ocupado o no está disponible.

trans-unit.source: The specified type is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> value (applies to set only).
trans-unit.target: El tipo especificado no es un valor de <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType" /> válido (sólo se aplica para establecer).
